description.p: [DEMO] [Work in Progress: https://github.com/lyskouski/app-language] Tlum - open source code (whitebox) cross-platform language learning application leverages the power of natural language processing to pinpoint pronunciation gaps, computer vision to enhance articulation, and machine learning to boost vocabulary proficiency.
If you would like to come with suggestions, report bugs, translate the app, or contribute otherwise, feel free to reach out - https://github.com/lyskouski/app-language!

This is the "open-source code" (whitebox) application that welcomes and values contributions from the community. However, there are some limitations when it comes to making external modifications and distributions, as it follows the CC-BY-NC-ND-4.0 license. As the project's author, I am committed to upholding the "Terms of Use" and "Privacy Policy" to ensure the well-being and satisfaction of all users across all platforms (Linux, Windows, macOS, iOS, Android).
